definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
esterase, enzyme that breaks up esters by hydrolysis

sentences.english: Using polyethylene glycol dimaleate as crosslinking agent, a high water-absorbent resin was synthesized.
